artist: Delineator: After Charles Eisen; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: portrait bust in an oval within an architectural cartouche; onright side of catrouche are 3 figures; on the left a kneeling man in prayer with a rooster on rock above; man turned right looking left toward viewer; wearing white neck cloth, jacket and with long curly hair
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in  black: Ch. Eisen del.  ficquet sc./ MATTHIEU / TERWESTEN, ELEVE DE SON FRERE / AUGUSTIN TERWESTEN. | on sheet in pencil: 2-463
title: Matthieu Terwesten
